alert.note: Alert for Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 9:10PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila and Maricopa Counties through 945 PM MST... At 909 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of Tonto National Monument, or 12 miles southeast of Roosevelt, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Roosevelt, Tonto National Monument and Roosevelt Estates. This includes AZ Route 188 between mile markers 220 and 244. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Tonto Basin
